message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CV 

The paper discusses the relationship between reinforcement learning and supervised learning, specifically in the context of policy gradient methods. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.RO (Robotics). The paper also includes a simple experiment involving image classification, which suggests a possible connection to cs.CV (Computer Vision). Finally, since the paper deals with sequential decision making, there may be some relevance to cs.SY (Systems and Control).
